DOC.brief_summary: Burnout patient show deficient work memory functioning . Several study show train increase work memory capacity . In current study explore whether train work memory reduce burnout burnout relate symptom increase work memory capacity .
DOC.brief_title: A Working Memory Training Burnout Patients
